author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Mix all the ingredients together and chill for one hour. Serve with bread and salad.
ingredients: 225g/8oz tomatoes, chopped into small pieces,  225g/8oz cucumber, peeled and cut into small pieces,  100g/4oz red onion, finely diced,  2 green chillies, deseeded and finely chopped,  2.5ml/½ tsp salt,  1.25ml/¼ tsp sugar,  3 tbsp fresh lemon juice,  2 tbsp fresh coriander leaves, chopped
